name: DownloadFileshareArtifacts
description: Download artifacts from a file share, like \\share\drop
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: artifactName
inputs.label: Artifact name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the artifact to download e.g drop

inputs.name: itemPattern
inputs.label: Matching pattern
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Specify files to be downloaded as multi line minimatch pattern. [More Information](https://aka.ms/minimatchexamples)

The default pattern (\*\*) will download all files within the artifact.

inputs.name: downloadPath
inputs.label: Download path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path on the agent machine where the artifacts will be downloaded

inputs.name: parallelizationLimit
inputs.label: Parallelization limit
inputs.helpMarkDown: Number of files to download simultaneously

instanceNameFormat: Download artifacts from a file share

messages.ArtifactNameDirectoryNotFound: Directory '%s' does not exist. Falling back to parent directory: %s
